duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage efficient flow of patients including screening, preparation for exam, instructing patients on collection of any necessary samples/tests, and obtaining vitals
Notify patients of test results and follow-up appointments and instructs patients and families regarding medications and treatment instructions
Manage patient records including chart entries and posting lab/tests and examination results
Schedule tests and treatments including arranging referrals to a specialist and obtaining pre-authorizations when directed by the provider

education_certification.credential: Graduation from an accredited school of practical nursing
Minimum of 2 years experience in a hospital or clinic setting is preferred
Must be licensed as a Licensed Practical Nurse in accordance with state regulations
